name: Mudsdale
description: It spits a mud that provides resistance to both wind and rain, so the walls of old houses were often coated with it.

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be confused.  If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

abilities.name: Stamina
abilities.effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.
abilities.description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
